summary: An email exchange between an FBI agent and a Henry County Police Department investigator regarding an individual with mental health issues in their jurisdiction. The email includes a forwarded PDF attachment and cautions about external email security.

persons.name: Will
persons.context: Sender of the initial email who provides information about an individual with mental health issues to the Henry County Police Department.

events.title: Email exchange regarding individual with mental health issues
events.description: An FBI agent emails Henry County Police Department to pass along information about an individual in their jurisdiction who is friendly and forthcoming but has mental health issues.

keyFacts: The email originates from an FBI agent (wmmauk@fbi.gov) to the Henry County Police Department.
The subject involves an individual in Henry County's jurisdiction with mental health issues who was described as friendly and forthcoming.
The email includes a PDF attachment (900305 AT FD71a.pdf) and contains security warnings about external email sources.
The Henry County Police Department's Criminal Investigations Division/SVU Crimes Against Children/ICAC is involved in the correspondence.
